tool.name: ExtractPoly

param.name: Input_Workspace
param.dialogReference: Local folder-type workspace where the extracted DEM output will be stored.

param.name: nedindx
param.dialogReference: Raster index polygon feature class from which the raster tile paths will be extracted.

param.name: clpfeat
param.dialogReference: Clipping polygon feature in the same projection as the elevation data tiles. Often, this is a buffered polygon of the hydrologic unit of interest.

param.name: OutGrd
param.dialogReference: Name of the output grid to be created in the workspace folder specified above.

tool.summary:
This tool extracts a polygon area from elevation data tiles and merges the extracted areas to a single elevation model grid.

This tool requires as input a polygon feature class created from a raster catalog and containing the full pathnames to each raster in the raster catalog (often 3DEP or NED, but probably other seamless tiled rasters would work).

Complete documentation can be found at XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX.
